<< mldivide elementary functions mtimes >>

vertcat

Vertical concatenation.

Syntax

R = vertcat(M1, M2, ... , MN)
R = [M1; M2; ... ; MN]

Input argument

M1

a variable

M2

a variable

MN

a variable

Output argument

R

result of [M1; M2; ... ; MN]

Description

R = vertcat(M1, M2, ... , MN) returns the vertical concatenation of M1, M2, ... , MN along the dimension 1.

Examples

A = eye(2, 2);
B = ones(2, 2);
C = vertcat(A, B)
D = [A; B]


A = 'nel';
B = 'son';
C = vertcat(A, B)

See also

horzcat.

History

Version Description
1.0.0 initial version

Author

Allan CORNET
